response.overview: On the anniversary of his wife's death, Anton prepares the ritual of distributing red roses, but a group of children steals his bag. Without the courage to continue, he decides to leave a rose with his neighbor Sofia, a woman who had warmed his life. Desperate, he stops in front of her house, but Sofia, touched by his sadness, sends him a cake with a warm note. The cake reminds Anton that, sometimes, small gestures of kindness can replace roses.
response.title: Një gjemb më pak
